projects.name: Power BI Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a robust interactive Power BI sales dashboard that provides key insights into revenue, sales, customer, and market segment performance. Utilized Power BI's data visualization capabilities to create engaging and informative dashboards that effectively communicate data driven insights to stakeholders. Enabled data-driven decision-making by providing users with the ability to drill down into data, filter and segment data, and perform ad-hoc analysis.

projects.name: Rainfall Prediction using Linear Regression
projects.description: Developed a linear regression model to predict rainfall in Austin, Texas. The model achieved an accuracy of 96% on unseen data. Gained insights into the relationships between rainfall and other weather variables, such as temperature, humidity, and wind speed. Demonstrated proficiency in data collection, cleaning, analysis, and modeling. Implemented an optimized regression model using Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow.

projects.name: COVID-19 Analysis and Visualization
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive analysis of COVID-19 infection rates and happiness factors across countries. Collected and cleaned data from multiple sources, including the COVID-19 Confirmed Dataset and the World Happiness Report. Performed exploratory data analysis to identify relationships between COVID-19 infection rates and happiness factors.
